sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HeroService } from '../hero.service'; import { Hero } from '../heroes/hero'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-bar', templateUrl: './search-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-bar.component.css'] }) export class SearchBarComponent { suggestedHeroes? : Hero[]; constructor(private heroService:HeroService ){} sendData(event: any){ const key = event.target.value; return this.heroService.getSuggestedHeroes(key) .subscribe(suggestedHeroes => this.suggestedHeroes= suggestedHeroes ); } }
